name: SE2-11 — NIGHT AT INTENDANCE
description:
Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare (Lazare Picault). Anse Intendance, Mahé. Where the sea writes in thunder, the sand keeps one coin.
Turn its scar toward the gentler shore.

attributes.value: Chapter II — The Landing at Baie Lazare

properties.cipher: coin notch aligns with shoreline sweep.
properties.clue:
Where the sea writes in thunder, the sand keeps one coin.
Turn its scar toward the gentler shore.
properties.visual_description: Wild surf; pirate hat on driftwood; skull-coin in sand; storm glow offshore.
